title: Duchess of Cambridge pictured at Sainsbury's, where she 'bought Halloween bits'
text:
The Duchess of Cambridge was pictured shopping at Sainsbury's. [Photo: SWNS/Getty]

The Duchess of Cambridge has been spotted shopping in Sainsbury's in Hardwick, Cambridgeshire.

Duchess Kate, 37, was pictured, together with Prince George, 6, and Princess Charlotte, 4, by a supermarket customer at the checkout. The royal wore a black polo neck and had her hair pulled back in a chignon as she made her purchases.

Mum-of-four Kathy Whittaker, 53, said of the celebrity spot: “Another shopper said that Kate was in the shop near the clothing and pointed where she was to me. I just couldn't believe it.”

READ MORE: Photographer reveals Duchess of Cambridge's trick to look more photogenic

"She was with Charlotte and George looking at Halloween outfits but her bodyguard was kind of watching people with phones and telling them no pictures.

"I managed to get the photo as she was at the self service check out.”

The Duchess of Cambridge spotted at Sainsbury's in Hardwick, Cambridgeshire. [Photo: SWNS] More

Kate Middleton pictured with Prince William on 17 October during the couple's recent tour of Pakistan. [Photo: Getty] More

She added: "I didn't see what she actually bought. The lady that told me she was there had children with her and she said Kate was asking her children what they were going to be for Halloween.

READ MORE: Shop the Duchess of Cambridge's new autumnal LK Bennett dress

"I think she bought some Halloween bits for her kids but I don't know what."

Kathy from Norwich, added that the Duchess appeared "down to earth" and looked "beautiful as always."
